name: SOUQALMAL Holding Limited
description: Operator of financial education wellbeing platform designed for employees in the Middle East. The company's platform offers information related to credit cards, personal loans, car loans, bank accounts, mortgages, insurance, mobile phone plans, broadband plans, schools, and nurseries, enabling users to make informed financial decisions.
